articles.title: Kansas vs Texas Tech: Predictions, Odds, Picks & How to Watch - Action Network
articles.description: Read for Kansas vs Texas Tech predictions, picks and odds for their college basketball game on Monday, February 2.
articles.content:
The Kansas Jayhawks take on the Texas Tech Red Raiders in Lubbock, Texas. Tip-off is set for 9 p.m. ET on ESPN.
Texas Tech is favored by 4.5 points on the spread with a moneyline of -205. The total … [+4419 chars]

articles.title: Adobe Animate is shutting down as company focuses on AI - TechCrunch
articles.description: Adobe Animate will be discontinued on March 1, 2026, as Adobe shifts its focus to AI.
articles.content: As Adobe rampsupitsinvestments in AI, the company has decided to shut down its 2D animation software, Adobe Animate. On Monday, Adobe issued an update to the company’s support site and sent emails to… [+2573 chars]
